name: Energy Force G
description:
Energy Force G is a Multi-directional shooter game where you are traveling the multiverse destroying everything in your path, collecting points and spending them on character upgrades!

You are a ball called Omega that shoots energy bullets infinitely, that loves destruction and collects mega power cells and souls to charge yourself so that you can become something more.

___

Operating Systems:

  • Windows 32 / 64
  • Linux 32 / 64
  • Mac 64

___

If you want to get in touch, report bugs, or know more about the game, you can find me @SteliosWinters

If you want to find out more about my other projects, check out - SteliosWinters.com

Music by Technoaxe

Thank you for visiting, and for those who enjoyed this page enough to buy it, I appreciate the support and I hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoyed creating and testing it!
